channel.title: Creating A Server?
channel.description: Hii.. I need help. I have downloaded MoparScape and i want to create a server....Help please? I need it in detail as i'm such a noob. =]

yea u dont all u need is a source but u cant quite control ur server and make i do anyfin u want

item.title: Creating A Server?
item.dc:creator: @Cyclone Cyclone
item.description:
@Cyclone wrote:

Lol i agree with O M G u dont need to know everything to code… im doing myn atm … ye its big and ye i do use alot of codes off forums which i thank the community for… but its pretty simple i guess…

Read mod Taharoks ultimate guide it might help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Creating A Server?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

[quote=“NexondotNet, post:4, topic:76451”]sure u can copy another guy’s server but what r u gonna do with that then? u dont no how to write scripts u cant update any features of ur server what r u gonna do with that server that u downloaded? nothing!!

ill give u a buck if u know what this means and is related to

if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {//combat_instructor is default. if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Follow The Line Of Hero's!";//yeah[/quote]
lol… I can code quiet well, just not to the full extent of what ever a static boolean is.

Your code means the Combat Instructor will say “Follow The Line Of Hero’s!” every 20 thingies… Also, you owe me a buck

Read full topic

item.title: Creating A Server?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“R34p3d, post:1, topic:76451”]Hii… I need help.
I have downloaded MoparScape and i want to create a server…Help please?
I need it in detail as i’m such a noob. =][/quote]
As mentioned above, there’s a stickied topic called the ‘Ultimate Server Guide’. However, there are also various other resources that you can benefit from. There are free Java tutorials on the Sun Java website for example. If you’re interested in learning Java, click the link in my signature.

Read full topic

if (npcs[i].npcType == 944) {//combat_instructor is default. if (misc.random2(20) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Follow The Line Of Hero's!";//yeah

item.title: Creating A Server?
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

[quote=“NexondotNet, post:2, topic:76451”]u have to know JAVA language eg : public static boolean(),
sendframe “welcome to rs”;

u gotta know what EACH symbol, line, figure mean[/quote]
Ahem… I beg to differ, I have no clue what a static boolean is, I don’t follow many tutorials, yet out of the 350+ people that play my server, 345 tell me it’s an incredible server. The other 5 are banned.

Use The Ultimate Server Guide. Follow it step by step, but use PimpScape, in the download section somewhere. If you don’t get something keep reading over it.

Read full topic
